---
title: " DATA TYPE-FACTOR"
output: html_notebook
---
to store categorical variables. it tells normally R that a variable is ordinal or nominal by making it a factor
```{r}
gender=c(1,2,1,2,1,1,2,2,1)
table(gender)
gender=factor(gender,levels = c(1,2),labels=c("male","female"))
table(gender)
plot(gender)
```
